value:
I love the feel of the wind. It's always
a balm for whatever's bothering me.

Wielding a sword is useful for more
than battle. I find that it also gives me
a peek into another person's thoughts.$k$pSo, I think I might know what's on
your mind, friend!

Good job out there. You be sure to
stay well rested. You carry the
heaviest load of all of us.

We should find a hill and look out
across the world. People really
don't do that nearly enough.

I may look calm—maybe even still.
But I'm really very focused. It's part
of my daily training with my sword.

I've been asked to come visit
you here by your friend
$Nf.$k$pNow, may your friendship
always remain strong!

The winds of my homeland are
blessing me today!
Oh, good! That seems pretty fair.

Not good at all. I'd better train
more often.
Thank you. Good to get stronger.

I'm Lyndis of the House of Caelin.
Yet I truly belong to the open
plains. Just call me Lyn, all right?

I'd like to offer my thanks today.
It's for all the times you've helped me.
Nothing more, nothing less.$k$pBut while I'm at it, I should also
thank you for giving me courage
and never failing to be kind.$k$pThose are rarer qualities than
you'd think. In fact...$k$pI think you're as precious to me
as the breeze that blows across
the open plains of Sacae.$k$pOh my! Pay me no mind. But,
please, know that I'm always
here for you, all right?
はっ！
やぁっ！
きゃああっ！
Just because I'm a girl...
Now I have you!
As if I'd lose!
By my sword!
Watch this!
Not yet...
Heehee
Need me, friend?
Some people might need to be prodded into action. Not me.
Glad to talk. It's nice to get what's on our minds out there in the open.
I'm always up early, so don't be surprised if I barge in and ask, "Are you awake yet?"
I grew up on the plains, so I'm pretty direct. Still, I have manners. Just not...etiquette.
How I long to be on the open plains. The feeling of the wind...
I'll protect you no matter what. Just stick close to me.
Got it.
Orders?
Let's go.
Who are you?
